Operation 'AddComment' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. The current description is vague about what inputs are required (comment text content), what the response contains, and what side effects occur (task update timestamp changes). The description lacks clarity on the request body structure and response schema. Added details about: (1) what constitutes the input (comment text in request body), (2) the purpose in context of task collaboration, (3) what the response includes (comment object with ID, author, timestamp, content), and (4) side effects (task update timestamp modification). This improves AI agent interpretability for determining when to use this operation and what to expect.

data.current_description:
Adds a comment to a [VTEX DO](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/vtex-do--7KMbRL4OslN8DTX9oiuCiu) task, filtering by task ID.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Adds a comment to a VTEX DO task identified by the task ID. The comment text is provided in the request body. This operation allows task collaborators to add notes and updates to task discussions. Returns the created comment object with metadata including the comment ID, author, timestamp, and content. The task's update timestamp is automatically updated when a comment is added.
data.reasoning: The current description is vague about what inputs are required (comment text content), what the response contains, and what side effects occur (task update timestamp changes). The description lacks clarity on the request body structure and response schema. Added details about: (1) what constitutes the input (comment text in request body), (2) the purpose in context of task collaboration, (3) what the response includes (comment object with ID, author, timestamp, content), and (4) side effects (task update timestamp modification). This improves AI agent interpretability for determining when to use this operation and what to expect.

message: Operation 'NewNote' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Description mentions limitations but lacks clarity on inputs (order ID required), outputs (returns note object), and what the note is used for. Enhanced version specifies the order association, input/output details, and maintains the important constraint information for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description:
Creates a new note in [VTEX DO](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/vtex-do--7KMbRL4OslN8DTX9oiuCiu). Be aware of the following limitations:

- The maximum number of notes for an order is 30.

- The maximum number of characters in a note's description is 2000.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.summary_suggestion: Create a new note for an order
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new note associated with a specific order in VTEX DO. Expects an order ID and note description in the request body. Returns the created note object with its ID and metadata. Note: Maximum 30 notes per order; description limited to 2000 characters. No License Manager resources required.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description mentions limitations but lacks clarity on inputs (order ID required), outputs (returns note object), and what the note is used for. Enhanced version specifies the order association, input/output details, and maintains the important constraint information for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description:
Retrieves notes related to a specific order ID.

## Permissions 

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all notes for an order
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all notes associated with a specific order ID in VTEX DO. Requires the order ID as a query parameter. Returns an array of note objects containing note IDs, descriptions, creation timestamps, and author information. Supports pagination through query parameters. No License Manager resources required.
data.reasoning: Summary lacks specificity about retrieving multiple notes. Description is too brief and doesn't explain the response structure or pagination support. Enhanced version clarifies that it returns multiple notes, specifies the response format (array of note objects), and mentions pagination capability for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description:
Creates a new task in [VTEX DO](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/vtex-do--7KMbRL4OslN8DTX9oiuCiu). 

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.summary_suggestion: Create a new task in VTEX DO
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new task in VTEX DO for order management and processing. Expects task details in the request body including title, description, assignee, and target (order ID or other entity). Returns the created task object with task ID, status, timestamps, and assigned user information. Tasks can be assigned to authorized users for order processing workflows.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks essential details about what inputs are required, what the task is for, and what is returned. Enhanced version specifies the purpose (order management), typical input fields, response structure, and context about task assignment for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'Listtasksbyassignee' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary is too generic and doesn't convey the filtering capabilities. Description is verbose with examples but lacks clarity on what is returned and how to choose between filtering options. Enhanced version provides a clearer summary, consolidates filtering options into a concise list, specifies the response structure, and clarifies status filtering syntax for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description:
This endpoint allows you to filter [VTEX DO](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/vtex-do--7KMbRL4OslN8DTX9oiuCiu) tasks. You can choose between the following filtering options:

- **Assignees:** using `assignee.email` and `status`. Example: `https://{{accountName}}.{{environment}}.com.br/api/do/tasks?assignee.email={{person@email.com}}&status={{open}}`. 

- **Targets:** using `targetId` and `status`. Example: `https://{{accountName}}.{{environment}}.com.br/api/do/tasks?target.id={{name}}&status={{open}}`. 

- **Paged tasks:** using `page`, `perPage` and `status`. Example: `https://{{accountName}}.{{environment}}.com.br/api/do/tasks?page={{1}}&perPage={{10}}&status=;{{-Closed}}`. 

- **Context:** using `context`, `page`, `perPage` and `status`. Example: `https://{{accountName}}.{{environment}}.com.br/api/do/tasks?context={{context}}&page={{1}}&perPage={{10}}&status={{-Closed}}`. 

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.summary_suggestion: List and filter tasks by assignee, target, or context
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a filtered list of VTEX DO tasks with multiple filtering options. Supports filtering by: (1) assignee email and status, (2) target ID and status, (3) pagination with page/perPage parameters, or (4) context with pagination. Returns an array of task objects containing task ID, title, description, assignee, status, and timestamps. Use status parameter to filter by task state (e.g., 'open', '-Closed'). Pagination defaults apply when not specified.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic and doesn't convey the filtering capabilities. Description is verbose with examples but lacks clarity on what is returned and how to choose between filtering options. Enhanced version provides a clearer summary, consolidates filtering options into a concise list, specifies the response structure, and clarifies status filtering syntax for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description:
Updates the status of a [VTEX DO](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/vtex-do--7KMbRL4OslN8DTX9oiuCiu) task, filtering by task ID.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Updates a VTEX DO task by task ID. Accepts task status changes and other task properties in the request body. Common status values include 'open', 'in-progress', and 'closed'. Returns the updated task object with new status, modification timestamp, and all task details. Supports partial updates - only provided fields will be modified.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic and doesn't indicate what can be updated beyond status. Description says 'updates the status' but is unclear about what other fields can be modified. Enhanced version clarifies that both status and other properties can be updated, provides examples of status values, specifies the response, and notes partial update support for better AI agent decision-making.
